Module ntnu.idatt1002
Package ntnu.idatt1002.utils

Class DateUtils

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt1002.utils.DateUtils
public final class DateUtils
extends java.lang.Object
The DateUtil class contains utility methods to alter the formatting of time.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static long getAsMs​(java.time.LocalDate localDate)
    Returns a long representing time in milliseconds since 1/1/1970 UTC+1.
    static long getAsMs​(java.time.LocalDateTime localDateTime)
    Returns a long representing time in milliseconds since 1/1/1970 UTC+1.
    static java.lang.String getFormattedDate​(long ms)
    Takes a long and turns it into a date in the format dd/MM/yyyy.

    Takes a long and turns it into a date in the format dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm.
    static java.lang.String getFormattedTime​(long ms)
    Takes a long and turns it into a date with the and outputs the time that given day.

    • getAsMs

      public static long getAsMs​(java.time.LocalDate localDate)
      Returns a long representing time in milliseconds since 1/1/1970 UTC+1.
      Parameters:
      localDate - Object of the LocalDateClass which refer to a specific date.
      Returns:
      The date given as milli seconds.

    • getAsMs

      public static long getAsMs​(java.time.LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      Returns a long representing time in milliseconds since 1/1/1970 UTC+1.
      Parameters:
      localDateTime - Object of the LocalDateTimeClass which refer to a specific time.
      Returns:
      The time given as milli seconds.

    • getFormattedFullDate

      public static java.lang.String getFormattedFullDate​(long ms)
      Takes a long and turns it into a date in the format dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm. The ms inserted represents the time since 1/1/1970 UTC+1.
      Parameters:
      ms - The time given as milli seconds.
      Returns:
      date and time given in the format dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm.

    • getFormattedDate

      public static java.lang.String getFormattedDate​(long ms)
      Takes a long and turns it into a date in the format dd/MM/yyyy. The ms inserted represents the time since 1/1/1970 UTC+1.
      Parameters:
      ms - The time given as milli seconds.
      Returns:
      date given in the format dd/MM/yyyy.

    • getFormattedTime

      public static java.lang.String getFormattedTime​(long ms)
      Takes a long and turns it into a date with the and outputs the time that given day. THe ms inserted represents the time since 1/1/1970 UTC+1.
      Parameters:
      ms - The time given as milli seconds.
      Returns:
      time given in the format HH:mm.
